name: Flutter Team
description:
Flutter Team is a singleplayer or local multiplayer game which you go through obstacles and try to complete your lifespan.

The multiplayer part depends on the 2 player trusting each other. If a player dies, they get revived after 7.5 seconds with 2.5 seconds of invincibility if the other player is still alive then. If they both die the game ends.

It is similar to flappy bird in some parts but has some different mechanics that sets it apart.

I might add a race mode in the future.
